name: Robbery (fmg)
description:
Robbery is a game where you have to steal as much cash as you can from a bank and avoid all the lasers.

Controls :

- Arrow keys to move

- Wait near the cash / bag to take / deposite the cach

- spacebar to leave the bank before the police arrive (you have to be near the exit door)

The downloadable executable plays better than the browser version.
